_README: To add or edit projects, simply modify the 'projects' array below. Each project needs: id (unique), name, projectId, status, address, coordinates (lat/lng), jobSize, workType, type, category, features (array), description, startDate, and estimatedCompletion. The file is automatically loaded by the website.
_TEMPLATE: Copy this template to add a new project (remove the _TEMPLATE key before using): {"id": "unique-id", "name": "Project Name", "projectId": "#PROJ-2024-01", "status": "Active", "address": "123 Main St, City, CA 12345", "coordinates": {"lat": 38.2975, "lng": -122.2869, "display": "38.2975° N, 122.2869° W"}, "jobSize": "Large Scale", "workType": "Estate Development", "type": "Structural", "category": "Commercial", "features": ["Feature 1", "Feature 2"], "description": "Project description here.", "startDate": "2024-01-01", "estimatedCompletion": "2024-12-31"}
